name: Slam Dunk Proto
description:
All humans have been reduced to square blocks. You play as the lone remaining conversationalist. Only you can protect the crabs from themselves and from the evil shellfish doctor, who only cares about himshellf. The crabs have learned the ability to fly, but they can't breathe out there. You need to put them back in the ocean. Forcefully.

Arrow keys to move.

Up to jump.

Z to down attack in the air.

X to side attack in the air.
